article.title: Christchurch_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: Christchurchis the third largest urban area in New Zealand.wiktionaryChristchurch
article.heading: Places

list.listitem: Christchurch, New ZealandChristchurch (New Zealand electorate), a former electorate in New Zealand, also called Town (or City) of ChristchurchChristchurch Central, the current electorate of Christchurch in New ZealandChristchurch Central City, the central business district of Christchurch in New Zealand

Christchurch, Dorset, town on the south coast of EnglandChristchurch Castle, a 12th-century ruin in the townChristchurch Harbour, next to the townChristchurch Priory, a historic church in the townRAF Christchurch, a WW II airfield near the townChristchurch (UK Parliament constituency), England, centered on the townChristchurch (Dorset) railway station, a train station serving the town
Christchurch, Gloucestershire, hamlet in the west of the Forest of Dean, Gloucestershire, England
Christchurch Mansion, a stately home in Ipswich, SuffolkChristchurch Park, a park surrounding Christchurch Mansion
Christchurch railway station, Dublin, a proposed train station in Dublin, Ireland

list.listitem: Christchurch Boys' High School, Christchurch, New Zealand

University of Otago Christchurch School of Medicine, one of three medical schools of University of Otago, New Zealand
Christ Church Anglo-Indian Higher Secondary SchoolChristchurch Anglo-Indian Higher Secondary School, Christchurch, Chennai, India
